name: Raspberry Picture Frame
short_description:
Raspberry Picture Frame Slideshow is focused on quick-to-set-up image slideshows for the Raspberry Pi (B, B+ and 2). 
Just insert an USB key with actual images or URLs of remote ones inside and boot: the system will display a slideshow of them.

Raspberry Picture Frame Slideshow shows a full-screen view restricted to the slideshow. It is a hacker-proof secure operating systems for indoor and outdoor use.

See http://www.binaryemotions.com/raspberry-slideshow for complete instructions.

NOTE

If you need an operating system designed for web digital signage on your Raspberry, please see: http://www.binaryemotions.com/raspberry-digital-signage

For video playback, have a look at: http://www.binaryemotions.com/raspberry-video
